Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.10.HPV"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.10.HPV

name: IMMZ.DT.10.HPV

title: IMMZ.DT.10.HPV

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give HPV vaccine according to the defined schedule

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT10

action

title: Immunize Patient for HPV - No Doses

description: Provide HPV immunizations - using the "HPV vaccine immunization - NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"HPV vaccine history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a two-dose schedule

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Sex" = "Female"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a two-dose schedule

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 9text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a two-dose schedule

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" <= 14text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a two-dose schedule

definition: IMMZ.DT.10.HPV.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for HPV - 2 Doses

description: Provide additional HPV immunizations - using "HPV vaccination immunization - 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (2+1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

*"HPV vaccine history" = "2 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for HPV Dose 3 - due to short interval between first and second dose
